name: Ninja Cafe - Main - Order - Done - Submit

speech:
Thank you for dining at Ninja Cafe! Your order will be arriving shortly.

In the meantime, let me know how else I can help you!

We have submitted your order and it will be arriving soon.

 I'll be right here if you need anything else!

Got it! Please be patient while your order is on its way.

How else can we be of assistance to you here at Ninja Cafe?
